casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Delmer CAUDILL, Jr. No. 71P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 26, 2008. Kevin Bradley, Durham, for Caudill. Elizabeth Weese, Assistant Attorney General. Roxann Vaneekhoven, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 19th day of February 2008 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th day of August 2008."
